results.definition: the relation between things (or parts of things) with respect to their comparative quantity, magnitude, or degree
examples: an inordinate proportion of the book is given over to quotations
a dry martini has a large proportion of gin

results.definition: harmonious arrangement or relation of parts or elements within a whole (as in a design)
balance among the parts of something
adjust in size relative to other things
the quotient obtained when the magnitude of a part is divided by the magnitude of the whole
